architectural_notes: Add front-end validation gating to prevent progression until required geography fields are selected, with user-facing error messaging.

existing_features.title: Prevent form progression/submission in the Create Instance Proposal flow when the required geography selections are missing (state always required; county required when a county/place selection is in-progress; place required when a place selection is in-progress), and ensure the user can trigger validation feedback even if the form is otherwise incomplete.
Display a clear, simple, English validation message telling the user what geography selection(s) they must make before continuing, and visually indicate which geography field is missing.
Change the static (fixed) top menu / logo bar (HomeHeader) background color to solid black while keeping existing layout and ensuring readable contrast for the logo and button.
Use the provided direct image URL as the homepage hero background image and bottom-justify the image (align to bottom) within the hero section.

new_feature_requests.summary: Block user progression when required geography fields are not selected
Display a clear message telling the user which geography selections are required
Set static menu and logo bar background color to black
Use provided direct image URL as the hero image and bottom-justify it

projectName: Geography validation guard + header styling + bottom-justified hero image
